meanings.definition: A cyclic pattern of physical, emotional, and intellectual changes in a person.
meanings.sent1: Her biorhythms dictated when she felt energetic or tired throughout the day.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study biorhythms to understand how our bodies function over time.
meanings.sent3: His biorhythms seemed to sync perfectly with the changing seasons.
meanings.sent4: The biorhythms of nature mirrored those within us, a dance of cycles.
meanings.sent5: Learning about biorhythms can help us take better care of ourselves.

meanings.definition: The theory that these changes are regulated by biological clocks.
meanings.sent1: According to the biorhythms theory, our bodies follow internal clocks for different functions.
meanings.sent2: Scientists debate the validity of the biorhythms theory in modern medicine.
meanings.sent3: The idea of biorhythms being controlled by tiny clocks inside us is quite fascinating.
meanings.sent4: In the world of biorhythms, our bodies are like intricate timepieces ticking away.
meanings.sent5: Understanding biorhythms as biological clocks can lead to new medical breakthroughs.
